Texts.Chs: 然而，他是一个无价的盟友。我可能不同意他的方法，但他的目的是正确的。而且他有自封的领主荆棘之翼的耳目。奇怪的时代造就了奇怪的同伙。现在不像有什么东西还在保持传统。
Texts.Eng: And yet, he's an invaluable ally. I may not agree with his methods, but his goals are sound. And he has the ear of the self-styled lord, Thornwing. Strange times make for strange bedfellows. It's not like anything is conventional these days.

Texts.Chs: 绿手指的笔记: 大猿
我得承认，这只猴子不合我的口味。他傲慢、粗鲁，而且是个低能的战术家。他坚持要出现在电视屏幕后面，这令人厌烦——他忘记了我知道他所有的小秘密。
Texts.Eng: I will admit, the ape is not to my tastes. He is brash, boorish and a poor tactician. His insistence in appearing behind a video screen is tiresome - he forgets I know all his little secrets.
